guest.name: Lauryn Isford
guest.title: Head of Growth
guest.background: Former Head of Growth at Airtable and Product Growth Lead at Facebook (Meta), where she worked on internet.org and growth in India. She also led growth for Blue Bottle's e-commerce business, bringing a unique blend of B2B and consumer growth experience.
guest.background_zh: 前 Airtable 增长负责人，曾任 Facebook (Meta) 产品增长主管，负责 internet.org 及印度市场的增长业务。她还曾主导 Blue Bottle 咖啡电商业务的增长，兼具 B2B SaaS 与消费级产品的增长实战经验。

episodeSummary: Lauryn Isford challenges the industry obsession with A/B testing everything, advocating for intuition-led product development. She dives deep into Airtable's activation strategy, explaining why they chose a difficult "Week 4 Multi-User" metric over vanity numbers, and outlines her four-step PLG funnel framework: Join, Evaluate, Upgrade, Expand.
episodeSummary_zh: Lauryn Isford 对行业内过度依赖 A/B 测试的现状提出了质疑，主张在产品开发中更重视直觉与定性研究。她深度解析了 Airtable 的激活策略，解释了为何选择高难度的“第4周多用户活跃”作为北极星指标，并分享了她的四步 PLG 增长漏斗框架：加入、评估、升级、扩展。
